channel.title: Invincible Houndeye in Office Complex
channel.description:
Map: bm_c1a2a at: -867 x, -221 y, 72 z setpos: -867.924805 -221.887924 72.031250 setang 5.834478 -171.926163 0.000000
After turning off the power and breaking my way through the window, I found myself breaking more windows in the next area. I spotted this Houndeye. I know you have to face him later in the chapter but at this point he was just standing there and being untouchable.
I tried to shoot him but there is an invisible wall at the broken window. I wasn't able to break any more glass from that window.
[attach=3753,none,1366][/attach] ![2015-05-09_00001.jpg|690x500](upload://1PQ6vsSb4xH1dWVi9QNRbySPWgb.jpeg)

item.title: Invincible Houndeye in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: Annariel
item.description:
Yes, I had a similar issue, crushed window act like the wall. The glass must be unbroken for the real easter egg.

Read full topic

item.title: Invincible Houndeye in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: Alphabetical
item.description:
What Shask said is true. Houndeye reacted by turning around and then went right back to watching his little TV. I was able to kill him.

Also, I managed to break the glass by crouch jumping onto the sill.

Still, that invisible wall is little bit awkward.

Read full topic

item.title: Invincible Houndeye in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: LamarrsAnomaly
item.description:
I had a similar issue early in the game when trying to shoot the zombie who crawls out of the sewer system and starts banging on the half open door (the scene where a door is between two sewer grates and you need to raise the water level to climb up to the opposing grate). Even though the door is open, the zombie couldn’t be shot.

Read full topic

item.title: Invincible Houndeye in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: Shask
item.description:
You can hit him. You just have to shoot right above the bottom of the window sill.

Read full topic

item.title: Invincible Houndeye in Office Complex
item.dc:creator: FERGUS
item.description:
I can confirm that you can’t shoot it through that window.

However, I believe it’s intentional. It’s an easter egg after all. (He is watching T.V if you didn’t notice.)

Read full topic

item.title: Invincible Houndeye in Office Complex

item.description:
Map: bm_c1a2a at: -867 x, -221 y, 72 z
setpos: -867.924805 -221.887924 72.031250

After turning off the power and breaking my way through the window, I found myself breaking more windows in the next area. I spotted this Houndeye. I know you have to face him later in the chapter but at this point he was just standing there and being untouchable.

I tried to shoot him but there is an invisible wall at the broken window. I wasn’t able to break any more glass from that window.
